name: A Modern Man
subtitle: A unique perspective on the world around us.
author: JD Ferrell
description: Being a progressive, open minded, down to earth, humble man is a rare thing. I'm all of those things..........well, I'm not perfect, but I do the best that I can to be an example of a "Modern Man". Join me as we examine the emotional, physical, and psychological aspects that we, millennial men, are going through, and as we look at the things we're doing to make an impact. A Modern Man is a safe, and welcoming, space to showcase the beauty and diversity of our species.

name: Just Jenna
author: Jenna Marilyn
description:
Just Jenna is a space for the curious, the thinkers, the deep-feelers, and the ones who want to live with a little more meaning.

Hosted by Jenna Marilyn, this podcast weaves together personal stories, unexpected insights, and thought experiments—gathered from books, breakdowns, brilliant minds, nature, memes, and the messiness of real life. Everything is shared in hopes it expands you the way it expanded her.

It’s not about having the answers.
It’s about noticing what moves you, asking better questions, and staying true to yourself.

Take what you want. Leave what you don’t.
And if you trip along the way…
She won’t tell anyone.
